name: saint
text: A comment left by saint was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Crowpaw, godfatherofsouls, nutmeg)

name: soticoto
text: Or half a Todd.

name: brosaurus
text:
If you force a horse to watch a non-stop Law and Order marathon (think "A Clockwork Orange" for how one might do this), the concentrated crimedramidium in the atmosphere will build up in its retina. At some point, this will cause its heart to stop instantly.

Teodor has clearly read about this.

name: sargasm
text: Maximum Cuddles sounds like the title of a Rod Huggins film.  In a perfect world?

name: babachewy
text: To me Maximum Cuddles sounds like a Steven Segal movie from Bizzaro-world.

name: stuart
text:
STEVEN SEGAL IN... MAXIMUM CUDDLES

SUMMER

name: anonymous44
text: "ONE MAN, ONE DESIRE..."

name: tim_simmons
text: wouldn't it be two men? jus' sayin ...

name: tekende
text: Maybe the other man does NOT desire maximum cuddles? But Segal is going to make him do it anyway.

name: boredom_man
text: STAY OUT OF MY DREAMSPACE TEKENDE

name: scorpio_nadir
text: TWO MEN, ONE HORSE!

name: njury
text:
To those naieve and curious, who might feel tempted to search the movie to wich this comment is reffering: don't.

I watched it. It's worse than 2 girls 1 cup.

text: Two men enter, one horse...

name: aperson
text: no moral!

name: atypicaloracle
text: See comic reference to dogshit and the maximum amount that something can be nasty.

text: Panel 7 gets this one a 5.

name: love_is_so_punk
text: It was already a 5 for me at panel 3, the rest was just icing.

text: i love teodor's little intense finger shaking at todd huggins

name: rogergs
text: Teo is not about to let any mere homosexual upstage him on the topic of metrosexual cocktails.

name: deancain29
text: A comment left by deancain29 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ohmygooses, pitseleh, sumisueme)

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Teodor has gay skills.

name: equinn2006
text: Because Straight Donald Trump has absolutely no style or dignity.

name: _cheesekayke
text: Poor Rod Huggins. He just wanted to be a good host.

name: dak
text: Yeah, I never understood why Teodor was such a jerk in this comic.  Rod's just trying to be nice, you know?

name: chrissketch
text: Teodor panicked and reacted in a way that most men straight men would, should they unwittingly find themselves on the set of gay porn. Doesn't really matter how nice the guy you were supposed to boink was to you.

name: spinynorman
text: Does Rod Huggins remind anyone of both a centaur and a devil, simultaneously?

name: blarghamagarky
text: wow

name: blarghamagarky
text: actually you know I think I am thinking more of a faun/devil rather than centaur/devil

name: spinynorman
text:
Faun. That's what I meant.

Or maybe a Satyr. But not a centaur, a centaur is a fucking horse-man. My mental classical bestiary is fading on me.

name: blarghamagarky
text: yes, shame on you.

name: spinynorman
text:
shame on my classical bestiary faculties

oh the shame

name: aki
text: Fie!

name: samuraieaux
text: Teodor has come a long way in knowing his cocktails. If you recall one of the earliest strips with Ray, he doesn't know jack shit about drinking.

name: gethen
text: Hanging with Ray for any length of time Teaches You About Drinking.

name: c_dizzle
text: no one uses the word 'rigmarole' anymore. 5 for reminding me of WC fields.

name: lavosxii
text: If this worked out, Teodor would have been the Cocktail Recipes of the porn industry, and that is just class.

name: foolio
text: Rod Huggins, college football player

name: salo
text: He is trying to leave the porno days behind him, and has changed his image.

name: the_stoned_one
text: Teodor wasn't so eager to leave when Hiram was giving him maximum coconut rum

text: I think Teodor comes out on top in this one.

text: Is worst pun, played on ugliest guitar.

name: killingthejay
text: that's a lot of law and order

name: direhaggis
text:
Teodor cannot accept the fact that Rod Huggins is a dick but a gracious host.

Also, for some crossover action, how about 'Maximum Cuddles on Fuck Mountain'. In 3D.

name: trainwreckmcgee
text: Just how much law & order will kill a horse?

name: pogo
text: I belive a horse died in "Ill-bred," Season 3, Episode 18, of Law & Order Criminal Intent.  That's how much L&O I watch!

name: pogo
text: No, wait, it was the regular Law & Order, Season 6, Episode 11, "Corpus Delicti" -- "The death of a show horse leads to a trial involving insurance fraud, a sting operation and a wealthy woman's disappearance."

name: jbushnell
text: I am giving you a chubby on the off chance that you are stone cold making that up

name: spinynorman
text: He isn't. I've seen it.

name: belgand
text: Watching one entire episode is enough to kill any thinking creature or at least lobotomize them enough that they might as well be dead.

name: belgand
text: Only 25 minutes (approx.) is required for L&O:SVU.

name: ryanfuss
text:
"Maximum cuddles. Minimum carpet burn."

SEGAL. VAN DAMME.

Tag team in the tundra...

name: boredom_man
text: [Jethro Tull]And that's all right... by me![/Tull]

name: mustakrakesh
text: W to the O to the R to the D.

name: aparrish
text: I am enheartened by the idea that, should I ever inadvertently find myself on the set of a gay pornographic movie, I will be treated with style and dignity.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: so long as you are in company of class such as Rod.

name: dusty
text: Rod Huggins kinda looks like a guy who owns a shop near here called "31st century" that sells weird dice and metal toy robots and orks. Most of the time its full of people who also look like Rod Huggins. They position the toys on green mats that sometimes have grids on them on tables, then they argue. Sometimes they roll dice, then argue some more.

name: selbencoirlo
text: Holy shit a nerd-store full of talking cats!

text: Was that T out-gaying Rod in the last panel?

text: i think so, too.  it looks like he did one of those finger snap things......
